data.text:
@nofearon01 Hi there, we are sorry to hear that your journey has been affected by a flight irregularity. Please send us your booking code, so we can take a closer look. Many thanks for your patience and understandung. 
Best regards, Shawn

@TheophilouMaria [2/2] has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. When you reported your missing bags you must've received a "PIR (Passenger Irregularity Report)" with a contact to reach for updates. Best regards, Denis

@sexynoahcyrus [1/2] Hi there, 
Thank you for sending us your inquiries. Please mind that due to the considerable amount of inquiries sent to us you may experience longer waiting times at the moment.

@sexynoahcyrus [2/2] We are doing our best and will reply to your concern as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn

@TheophilouMaria [1/2] Hi Maria, we're sincerely sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. We want you to know that we can completely understand your anger but we can't offer an immediate solution in this case. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team

@cosminalbertro Hi Cosmin, please mind that due to the considerable amount of inquiries sent to us you may experience longer waiting times at the moment. We are doing our best and will reply to your concern as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding. Best regards,Denis

@gold_matt [2/2]  Sofern du von Wien aus wegfliegst, kannst du am Vorabend bereits dein Gepäck einchecken. 
Liebe Grüße, Shawn

@gold_matt [1/2] Hallo Matthias, 
es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten hattest telefonisch mit uns in Kontakt zu treten. Aufgrund der aktuellen Situation sind leider alle unsere Kanäle überlastet und es kann zu längeren Wartezeiten kommen.

@ohhmylesley [2/2] Therefore, we kindly ask you to contact our colleagues via the following Email: centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com - Many thanks for your continued patience. 
Best regards, Shawn

@ohhmylesley [1/2] Hi there, 
we are sorry for all the trouble caused. We, the social media team, unfortunately, do not have any access to any of your claims submitted regarding your luggage.

data.text: @EmmaPow70226976 Hi, our colleagues will reply to you as soon as possible. They are currently confronted with a high amount of requests and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average responding time. We apologize and appreciate your continued patience. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@makopolok Hi, we are sorry to hear you have been having issues with our webforms. Please try a different browser and if the problem persists email your inquiry to impressum@austrian.com Kind regards, Lyndsay

@HeloiseLvlls @LOTPLAirlines @FlyingBrussels Hi, I am sorry to hear about your delayed baggage. Please send your compensation request to my colleagues from Customer Relations via our online feedback form: https://t.co/vE0LDWoEXD. They will then review your matter and get back to you. Best regards, Denis

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @ellie18490752 Hi Ellie, unfortunately not :(. You can buy the necessary clothes/items, according to the general regulations, stating that for temporary loss of baggage, 100% for hygienic articles and 50% for clothes that were bought in the meantime, will be indemnified. Kind regards, Funda

data.text: @teresaeder @Dulles_Airport Hi Teresa, I am sorry to learn that. Please fill out our webform via the following link: https://t.co/RUweBuUGYX  Kind regards, Funda

data.text: @StefanInKosovo Hi Stefan, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Please try to open the page with a different browser or fill out the form via the following link https://t.co/hBT1kXfTqt and send it to CentralBaggage.Tracing@austrian.com. Kind regards, Funda

@heloiselvlls Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything that we can still assist you with? If you are referring to an existing booking please send us the booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Chris

@ellie18490752 Hi Ellie, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@drmizori Hi there, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris

@covertbabo2 Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

data.text:
@marekthorn5 [2/2] You will receive information via mail as long as your contacts have been put correctly in the reservation. Many thanks for your understanding and patience. 
Best regards, Shawn

@marekthorn5 [1/2] Hi Marek, 
Thank you for getting in touch. Unfortunately, we cannot assure you that on your date of departure, there is no irregularity given. But what we can assure you is that you are going to be informed about any flight changes in your booking.

@MilsomChr Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@mlnpaolo Hi Paolo, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@VDaande Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@AlexConu Hi Alex, we regret reading about this unfortunate situation. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/sSgtzBH5GA  Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @tjclccs_tauseef Hi, is the tickets issue? If yes, tickets are only issued after the passengers have reviewed their flights, accepted the terms & conditions, and paid the selection. If the changes were made after issuance from our side, then we can gladly take a look into it. Kind regards, Daphne
@toulla_ @HeathrowAirport @lufthansa Hi Toulla, please fill out the form via the following link: https://t.co/CgMGcq98lb Kind regards, Funda

data.text: @PeterBeswick9 Hi Peter, we're sorry that your payment has been rejected. Have you tried another payment method? You can also pay at the airport, but the fees may differ. You can easily check the prices here: https://t.co/sbRZzqs60x Kind regards, Daphne

urls.title: Baggage calculator
urls.description: Your baggage allowance on scheduled flights and the cost of optional baggage varies depending on the route and the class of travel or fare booked. Use our calculator to check how much baggage you are allowed to take on scheduled flights and how to add optional baggage.

data.text: @vxchv_ Hi there, thank you for reaching out. We replied to your DM already. Kind regards, Funda
@solotravelstory  Hallo Carolin, bitte sende uns deinen Buchungscode und wir können gerne nachsehen. Liebe Grüße, Daphne

@PsychSchool Hi, our colleagues are doing their best to reunite each bag with its owner as soon as possible. As soon as your bag has been located they will be in touch. We're sorry but the current situation means this is taking longer than normal. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@MichiFerschmann Hi there, We currently have a lot of calls again. Of course, we also want to take the time that each passenger needs. We can assure you that we are in full commitment for you and we are doing everything so that we can quickly offer you our usual service again. Kind regards, Chris

@Mayankkhandelw6 Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

@TheNinoHr Hi Nino, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris
@covertbabo2 Hi there, We apologize for any inconvenience caused. You can check the status of your baggage via the following link https://t.co/5a1xgUCD33 Kind regards, Chris

@inknn Hi, es tut uns sehr leid, dass dein Koffer nicht mit dir angekommen ist. Bitte kontakitere unsere KollegInnen über die Nummer auf deinem Missing Luggage Report, da wir, das Social Media Team, leider keinen Zugang zum Gepäckssystem haben. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@MichiFerschmann Hi there, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Kind regards, Chris

Best regards, Shawn
@MadeInSyria [1/2] Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@blolop_ Hi, I am sorry to hear about your delayed baggage. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. Best regards, Denis
@taifbehnam96 Hi there, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane
@taifbehnam96 Hi there, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane

@miesmiesx Hi Michelle, the self-service kiosks and baggage drop-off devices are available for use from 04:00 until check-in deadline of the last flight of the day. We advise our customers to arrive at the airport not later than 4 hours prior to your departure. Best regards, Christiane

@leiannawrites @flughafen_wien @la_Biennale Hi Leianna, thank you for contacting us! Please provide us with your booking reference or ticket number via PM. We will take a closer look. Best regards, Denis

@Debora__k Hi Débora, this depends on which nationality the ID card is, and what the origin and destination are. As Austrian Airlines comply with the entry regulations specified by the respective national authorities, please contact them directly. Kind regards, Daphne
@mqatel3 @flughafen_wien @la_Biennale Hi, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane
@SoloTravelStory Hi Carolin, Austrian Airlines online check-in usually opens from 47 hours before scheduled departure from and to Vienna. Best regards, Denis

@vonleonie1 @flughafen_wien @la_Biennale Hallo, unser Customer Service Center ist täglich von 08:00 bis 20:00 Uhr erreichbar aus Erfahrungswerten empfehle ich dir zwischen 08:00 und 09:00 Uhr anzurufen, da die Wartezeit kürzer ist. Ich bitte um dein Verständnis und wünsche einen angenehmen Tag! Liebe Grüße, Denis

@dayavaidya Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report. Kind regards, Funda

@vivi_bulle @ParisAeroport @union_conso @60millions @ECCFrance [1/2] Hi there, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report. Kind regards, Funda

@GuilPerrault [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Best regards, Shawn
@GuilPerrault [1/2] Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@rsamii Dear Roxanna,
If we do not find your bag within five days, please send the completed Baggage Questionnaire Form to vielzos@austrian.com.
Important: List the contents of the missing bag as precisely as possible. This makes it easier for us to search for it.
Best regards, Alessa

@NoxhOfficixl @lufthansa Hi, I am sorry to hear that. The Social Media Team does not have access to the baggage system. Please get in touch with the phone number on your lost baggage report or you can check the status of your baggage online via this link https://t.co/hrzpeJ2rHC Best regards, Alessandra

data.text: @Tacticalan Hi Alan, thanks for your message and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenient experience. Please provide us with your booking reference or ticket number via PM in order to be assisted accordingly. Kind regards, Denis
@onecent_ Hi, you can use our online form to claim for the compensation https://t.co/j6zTw51Fg7. Best regards, Susi

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@Yvettevdl @austrian [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Best regards, Shawn
@Yvettevdl @austrian [1/2] Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@alexcarrabre Hi Alex, I'm sorry that you're still missing your bag. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact stated on your Passenger Irregularity Report. Best regards, Denis

@Flyfishing123 Hi, I am sorry you have been experiencing problems with our web check-in. Please try again on our website with your booking code or contact our colleagues at the check-in desk directly. They will be happy to assist you. Best regards, Denis

@Kristinerrr__ Hello Kristina,
We're sorry if you've had difficulties getting in touch. Do send us a private message if there's anything we can help you with. 
Best regards
Alessandra

@kmlvrmln [2/2]which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Best regards, Denis

@kmlvrmln [1/2] Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR

@LadyBismuto [2/2] Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report or PIR which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. 
Liebe Grüße, Shawn

@LadyBismuto [1/2]
Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@DS_Beauftragter [2/2]Bitte teile uns mit wie wir dir an dieser Stelle weiterhelfen können. 
Liebe Grüße, Shawn

@DS_Beauftragter [1/2] Hi, 
es tut uns leid, dass du Schwierigkeiten hattest telefonisch mit uns in Kontakt zu treten. Aufgrund der aktuellen Situation sind leider alle unsere Kanäle überlastet und es kann zu längeren Wartezeiten kommen.

@LyJo3 [2/2] There is no security check between your flights. Of course, my colleagues on board and at the airport will be happy to assist you in finding the gate for your connection. Best regards, Denis

@LyJo3 [1/2] Hi Lydia, please be informed that the minimum connecting time in Vienna is 30  minutes. This time is enough to transfer from one gate to the next if you already checked in for your connecting flight.

@LoftJakob Hi Jakob, I am sorry to hear about your delayed baggage. The Social Media team does not have access to the baggage system. Unfortunately, we can not help you in this matter. Best regards, Denis

@saluteAUT Hi there, I would like to sincerely apologize for the flight overbooking. Please provide us with your booking reference or ticket number in order to be assisted accordingly. Best regards, Denis
@rsamii Hi Roxanna, please be assured that we’ll do all possible to reunite asap. Sorry for the inconvenience. Best regards, Susi

@sanazyah Hi there, we are sorry for all the inconvenience caused during your journey. We inform you that we have responded to a previous tweet of yours. For further questions, please send us a PM. Many thanks for your patience and understanding. 
Best regards, Shawn

Best regards, Shawn

@sanazyah @Schiphol @aviapartnerF [1/2]
Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@FrauHolleR [2/2] However, please note that depending on the country of origin and destination, wearing a mask on board may be mandatory. We recommend that passengers inform about the respective regulations of their country of departure and destination.
Best regards, Shawn

@FrauHolleR [1/2] Hi there,
on board Austrian Airlines flights, the mask requirement has officially been lifted. If you feel more comfortable "with", you may of course continue to use your mask.
